questions.text: Indicate how much time has passed between: %1 and %2
Recess begings at %1 it ends at %2. Write how long recess lasts.

Jorge leaves his house at %1 and arrives at the school at %2.
				Write how long it takes Jorge to walk to the school?
If now is %1, what time will be in %2

Mary arrives at the cinema %2 after, the movie started at %1.
			 	Write the time that Mary arrives at the cinema.

Each day at school the Math practice starts at %1, and finish %2 after.
				Write the time the Math practice ends

Fernando goes to wait for the bus each day at %1, but the bus arrives at %2.
				Write how long passed between that Fernando goes to wait the bus and the arrive time.

Lulu goes for a ride on her bike at% 1, she goes a long way from home,
				when she decides to come back it takes% 2 to finally make it. Tell me the time that Lulu comes home.
Its %1, what time was it %2 ago

Julia arrives %2 minutes before her %1 appointment.
				Tell the time Julia arrives.

Joe go to the mall %2 before meeting his friend at %1.
				Write the time that Joe arrives at the mall.
